name: Time Warp (itch) (Cooldj604)
description:
My second ever game jam and first 2D game, Time Warp made for the August Brackeys game jam 2021. 

Experience chaos in this challenging 2D bullet hell. Strategically use your speed powers to get through the level! Good luck!

*Additional notes

- The font used is "Free Pixel Font - Thaleah" on the unity asset store.

- Unfortunately, full screen messes with the dimensions of the game and shows the screen borders too prominently. I would recommend not using full screen for this game.

- Really poorly optimized so I'm sorry if it lags

- For clarification the ending high score is your best time in seconds
